item.title: LSU to pay Kiffin based on Ole Miss' CFP success
item.description: Lane Kiffin's contract with LSU includes the unique clause that he will receive a bonus payment equal to the amount had he coached Ole Miss in the Col...

item.title: Sources: Spartans hire Fitzgerald on 5-year deal
item.description: Former Northwestern coach Pat Fitzgerald has signed a five-year contract to become the next head football coach at Michigan State, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Michigan rises to No. 3 in AP Top 25 men's poll
item.description: Michigan jumped to No. 3 in the Associated Press Top 25 men's basketball poll Monday as rival Michigan State and Iowa State both climbed into the top ...

item.title: Sources: Chesney set to be named UCLA coach
item.description: James Madison coach Bob Chesney has emerged as the target of UCLA's coaching search, sources told ESPN, and is set to sign a five-year deal that will ...

item.title: Thielen cut to seek bigger role in last NFL season
item.description: The Vikings have waived Adam Thielen at the veteran wide receiver's request, the team announced Monday.
